Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Database class is used to serialize data that needs to be stored between program instances.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Oliver Nixon, Riyaad Islam

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Database() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<Librarian> getLibList()
      Getter method used to retrieve data from serialized file and deserialize the data and return the ArrayList of Librarian stored in the file.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Resource> getResourceList()
      Getter method used to retrieve data from serialized file and deserialize the data and return the ArrayList of Resource stored in the file.
      static java.util.ArrayList<User> getUserList()
      Getter method used to retrieve data from serialized file and deserialize the data and return the ArrayList of User stored in the file.
      static void saveData()
      Void method to save data currently stored in the program to the .ser files.
      static void setupFiles()
      Method to be called when there are no files currently on the system.
      static void storeLibList(java.util.ArrayList<Librarian> al)
      Method used to serialize an ArrayList of Librarian to store in a .ser file.
      static void storeResourceList(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> al)
      Method used to serialize an ArrayList of Resource to store in a .ser file.
      static void storeUserList(java.util.ArrayList<User> al)
      Method used to serialize an ArrayList of User to store in a .ser file.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • storeResourceList

        public static void storeResourceList(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> al)
        Method used to serialize an ArrayList of Resource to store in a .ser file.
        Parameters:
        al - The ArrayList of Resource to be serialized and written to a file.

      • getResourceList

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Resource> getResourceList()
        Getter method used to retrieve data from serialized file and deserialize the data and return the ArrayList of Resource stored in the file.
        Returns:
        The ArrayList of Resource stored in resourcelist.ser.

      • storeUserList

        public static void storeUserList(java.util.ArrayList<User> al)
        Method used to serialize an ArrayList of User to store in a .ser file.
        Parameters:
        al - The ArrayList of User to be serialized and written to a file.

      • getUserList

        public static java.util.ArrayList<User> getUserList()
        Getter method used to retrieve data from serialized file and deserialize the data and return the ArrayList of User stored in the file.
        Returns:
        The ArrayList of User stored in userlist.ser.

      • storeLibList

        public static void storeLibList(java.util.ArrayList<Librarian> al)
        Method used to serialize an ArrayList of Librarian to store in a .ser file.
        Parameters:
        al - The ArrayList of Librarian to be serialized and written to a file.

      • getLibList

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Librarian> getLibList()
        Getter method used to retrieve data from serialized file and deserialize the data and return the ArrayList of Librarian stored in the file.
        Returns:
        The ArrayList of Librarian stored in liblist.ser.

      • saveData

        public static void saveData()
        Void method to save data currently stored in the program to the .ser files.

      • setupFiles

        public static void setupFiles()
        Method to be called when there are no files currently on the system. Should be set up to contain some data to avoid null pointer exception on program startup.
